item.title: Warframe: Oraxia Bundle
item.description:
Title: Warframe: Oraxia Bundle
Genre: Action , RPG , Free To Play
Developer: Digital Extremes
Publisher: Digital Extremes
Release Date: Jun 25, 2025




About This Content

This Bundle includes:
  • Oraxia
  • Oraxia Chelicera Helmet
  • Spinnerex
  • Scyotid
  • Arachna Armor
  • Zygiella Ephemera
  • Scuttler Domestik Drone
  • 370 Platinum
This bundle may only be purchased once per account.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This DLC may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit (32-bit not supported)
    • Processor: Intel Core i7 860, Intel Core i5 750, or AMD FX-4100 (SSE 4.2 support required)

    • Video: DirectX 11+ capable Graphics Card
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Storage: 50 GB available HD space
    • Internet: Broadband Internet Connection Required

    Note: There is no Mac or Linux client currently available.

    DirectX 12 support requires at least Windows 10 20H2 (released in 2020) or Windows 11
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

item.title: ToHeart
item.description:
Title: ToHeart
Genre: Adventure , Simulation
Developer: AQUAPLUS
Publisher: DMM GAMES , Shiravune
Release Date: Jun 25, 2025




About This Game

The late-’90s landmark visual novel from AQUAPLUS is back and fully remastered!

  • 3D scenes and animations!
  • Updated art in full HD, with modern Windows support!
  • Your choice of classic or all-new voiceovers!
  • English & Chinese in addition to Japanese!



Discover the “heartful love comedy” that has captivated Japanese hearts for over a decade!

STORY

Spring is almost here!

Strolling down a street paved with pastel tiles, the sun warms my back as pigeons flock by the roadside. Amid this everyday scenery, it’s another ordinary morning, with just a soft whisper of spring on the wind.

“It’s a little warmer again today, huh?” Akari pipes up as she turns her eyes to me, her bangs swaying gently in the breeze. “I guess winter’s over.”

“I guess it is,” I answer offhandedly, and Akari giggles. I don’t know why.

ToHeart is a “heartful,” heartfelt, and comedic multiple-ending visual novel.
The protagonist is an utterly ordinary young man, but his friends Akari, Masashi, and Shiho make every day a happy one.

As winter turns to spring and March turns to April, the wind also carries a whisper of love.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX1050Ti
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 40 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400 or better
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce RTX2060
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 40 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD recommended

item.title: Nanomon Virtual Pet
item.description:
Title: Nanomon Virtual Pet
Genre: Action , Adventure , Casual , Indie , RPG , Simulation
Developer: Oscar Brittain
Publisher: Akupara Games
Franchise: Akupara Games
Release Date: Jun 24, 2025




About This Game

Hatched in the depths of cyberspace, every Nanomon needs a tamer This is your chance to raise a pet monster from the safety of your desktop! From Magical Cats, to Retro Dragons, there’s a Nanomon to match everyone’s style!

Your skill as a tamer will determine whether your monster becomes the STRONGEST, the FASTEST, or maybe just the best watermelon farmer in the Nanoscape? Use your trusty Guide Book to help your Nanomon reach its full potential!

You wanna be the very best? You wanna be a legend? Then hone your Nanomon into a fierce fighter! Battle your friends online, duking it out with your best Nanomon, see who has what it takes to win!

Hard at work? Or hardly working? Nanomon has you covered either way. You can dive into a dungeon, head out fishing, or just play ball with your Nano-pal. When you need a break, they’re always down to have a nap at Home.

The Nanoscape is a massive world that fits into a tiny window! The secrets of the Nanoscape are yours to uncover! Exploring ever-changing biomes, feeding them new foods, and… cleaning up its business. Nanomon are curious and ready to roll, so prepare for adventure!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: 3rd Gen i3/AMD FX-4100 Series
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce 7 Series/Radeon R7 Series
    • Storage: 250 MB available space
    • Additional Notes: 1080p display
    Recommended:
    • Memory: 2 MB RAM
    • Storage: 250 MB available space

item.title: Wordatro!
item.description:
Title: Wordatro!
Genre: Indie , Strategy
Developer: Le Poulet
Publisher: Abiding Bridge
Franchise: Abiding Bridge
Release Date: Jun 23, 2025




About This Game

It all started on a rainy afternoon, trapped in an endless word game session with his grandma. That’s when he wondered: how to make it even more engaging and replayable for everyone?

So he took the original word-game challenge, sprinkled in some roguelite mechanics, added a cozy art direction and strategic choices, and boom! Wordatro! was born — your next favorite word game addiction.

Now sit back, relax, and prepare to spell your way to victory!

Wordatro is an easy-to-get-into roguelite word game that challenges both your linguistic and strategic thinking. Build words using a limited pool of letters, with each letter carrying a unique point value. Your goal? Create high-scoring words , trigger powerful combo multipliers , and unlock strategic bonuses to progress through 10 intense levels .

Strategy

Choose your words , special letters , and bonuses wisely to rack up combos , score big , and level up ! But watch out, you’ve only got a limited number of tries to hit the target score. Need help? Reroll your letters and hope for a better hand!

Roguelite

No two runs are ever the same! Each run presents a fresh combination of letters, bonuses, and challenges . With over 50 bonuses and challenges , Wordatro! offers an endless replayability . Start a new run, test different playstyles, and experiment with new strategies !

Challenge

Take on unique challenges to spice up your runs! From achieving a run to spelling ‘Wordatro’ itself, test your skills and push your limits across 50 creative achievements .

Every day, take on the Daily Challenge , a unique seed, and compare your score on a global leaderboard. How high can you score?

Features

  • Endless replayability: Infinite combinations of letters, bonuses, and challenges.

  • 50+ Unique bonuses: Game-changing upgrades and synergies to max out your points.

  • 50 Creative challenges: Test your skills on a myriad of additional challenges.

  • Daily challenges: Compete globally on a fresh puzzle every day.

  • 7 Playable languages: Form words in English, French, Spanish, German, Italian, Brazilian Portuguese and Dutch.

  • Difficulty levels: Progress at your own pace

  • Cozy & relaxing: Take your time to compose words in a relaxing ambiance.

JOIN THE WORDATRO! COMMUNITY

Join the Wordatro! Discord community to show off your highest scores, your most shameful words, and chat about the Daily Challenge.

Plus, get access to exclusive giveaways just for members !

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i3
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: integrated graphics
    • Storage: 200 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Arbites Class Deluxe Edition
item.description:
Title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Arbites Class Deluxe Edition
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie
Developer: Fatshark
Publisher: Fatshark
Franchise: Warhammer , Fatshark
Release Date: Jun 23, 2025




About This Content

You are justice.

The Adeptus Arbites enforce the Lex Imperialis – the Imperial Law. Utterly unforgiving, they persecute heretics and traitors throughout the Emperor’s realm. As an Arbitrator, you are a warrior of the Emperor’s justice, prosecuting crimes against the Imperium with disciplined zeal. Restore order to Tertium with your Cyber-Mastiff and a devastating array of new weaponry.

Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Arbites Class Deluxe Edition includes*:

  • Arbites Class

  • Unique Class Outfit

  • Unique Companion Outfit

  • Portrait Frame

  • 4 Weapon Skins

*Aside from the portrait frame, these cosmetics are exclusive to the Arbites Class and cannot be equipped on other classes.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Includes bloody violence and gore.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) / Windows 11 (64 bit)
    • Processor: Intel i5-6600 (3.30GHz) OR AMD Ryzen 2400G (3.6 GHz)
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 OR AMD Radeon RX 570
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 72 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) / Windows 11 (64 bit)
    • Processor: Intel i7-9700K (3.70GHz) OR AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (4.2GHz)
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 / RTX 2060 OR AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 72 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: An SSD storage device is highly recommended
